message: Did anyone try AB testing before? can you give me your experience of this type of testing? and technologies for establishing this kind of testing?

data.message: https://blog.optimizely.com/2010/11/29/how-obama-raised-60-million-by-running-a-simple-experiment/ Try this link it is explaining the biggest example of such AB testing.

In big companies sometimes they call it experiments like for example assume that you have a booking button in your app you will create two colors for this button for example blue and yellow and for each user you will apply a small algorithm to specify the user type whether he is a or b and according to the user type you will change the button color. this type of testing will help you to determine which button color will attract users to your app and make more bookings or stay more in the screen , it is just analytic way to test the user interaction with a new feature
Did you try to establish this kind of testing before? Abdulla .. do you have any idea about its technologies?
